Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Polykinds laid siege to the Quarantined Village.

Kill {@LinkCreature:40#20#mad}, {@LinkCreature:40#19#mutant}, and {@LinkCreature:40#24#crazed polykinds}, and {@LinkCreature:40#23#guardian aberrations}.

Report to Coordinator Glasrinne when mission is complete.
You’ve earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven’t completed your mission yet.
